definition: not having a common center, a person with particular interests and/or mannerisms
details:
adjective
- not having a common center
= synonyms: nonconcentric
- conspicuously or grossly unconventional or unusual
= synonyms: bizarre, freakish, freaky, flaky, flakey, gonzo, off-the-wall, outlandish, outre
noun
- a person with particular interests and/or mannerisms
= example: a person with particular interests and/or mannerisms
= synonyms: case
- a person with an unusual or odd personality
= synonyms: flake, eccentric person, oddball, geek
